EmailTemplate.name: LE-202210-WP-OTH-SEVT-HLTH-CAMPAIGN.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Enhance your virtual care strategy. Let's connect at HLTH!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
See you at HLTH!
Attend our feature sessions at HLTH to hear how innovation in integrated whole-person virtual care is leading to better results for members, organizations and society at large. You won’t want to miss these valuable and timely insights!
Results, Innovation and Equity Laying the Ground for Whole-Person Care Tuesday, November 15, 10:10 a.m. PST
Jason Gorevic CEO Teladoc Health
Healthcare solutions should make people healthier. This may sound obvious, but in a time when consumer expectations and financial markets are shifting it can be challenging to envision a connected, personalized and frictionless hybrid healthcare experience for consumers, hospitals and health systems, health plans and employers that delivers real value. We’re changing that.
Real-World Results of Whole-Person Virtual Care Monday, November 14, 11:00 a.m. PST
Dr. Vidya Raman-Tangella Chief Medical Officer Teladoc Health
Dr. Rajiv Patel President of Health Care Enterprises Provider Strategy Centene
Can telehealth crack the code on patient-centered, value-based care? In this session, Dr. Vidya Raman-Tangella of Teladoc Health and Dr. Rajiv Patel of Centene re-imagine the care delivery model, share patient and provider experiences and challenge us to deliver personalized, hybrid healthcare that reduces barriers to high-quality care and improves health outcomes.
How can integrated whole-person virtual care help your organization achieve its goals? Let's talk.
Request an appointment today <[[https://go1.teladochealth.com/HLTH-2022-Registration.html]]>
About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
